page.title: 15What Shaun does in Farndon
page.content: Some nights after school me and my friend Richard go to the BMX tracks for a muckabout. At the track there are 4 burns, 2 table tops and 2 whoops. After a time, if we get bored, we go to the field for a game of football. At the field there are a few things to play on. There is a slide, a climbing frame and some swings. There used to be a roundabout but it got burnt down. On Thursday it is Cubs. We just do games on the first day back. First we get in Sixes and then we do Grand Howl. In that we squat down, one of the cubs say a line and we repeat it. Then we do inspection; after that we take off our caps and play a few games before going home.
